page.title: 04CARDREW IND. EST. REDRUTH
page.content: Of the 354 people employed in the estate, 239(67%) are men and 116(33%) women 48 (14%) are emloyed in management 81 (23%) work in clerical jobs 112(32%) work in skilled jobs 113(32%) work in unskilled jobs. Of the businesses 17(89%) are main or only branches of the company, 10(43%) moved from a previous site to Cardrew, 9(39%) started up at this site. {ORIGIN OF WORKFORCE} JOB RECRUITED MOVED WITH RECRUITED TYPES LOCALLY COMPANY OUTSIDE REDRUTH manag. 28 15 13 cleric. 58 11 7 skilled 82 19 16 nonskil.100 6 10 {total 268 51 46}
